entities.name: the burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is described as the home of Harry, Ron, and Hermione. It is mentioned that there was snow over The Burrow's garden.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a person who is feeding Buckbeak in front of his cabin.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is mentioned as an animal that Hagrid is feeding.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as a person who is trying to enter The Burrow with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: the fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is described as a guardian of the entrance to The Burrow.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as someone who is calling out to Harry and Ron.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a person who has just returned home and is hurrying towards Harry and Ron.

relationships.description: Ron interacts with The Fat Lady by trying to enter The Burrow.
